meanings.definition: A man who sells or delivers ice.
meanings.sent1: The iceman delivered a block of ice to our house.
meanings.sent2: Every morning, the iceman drives around the neighborhood selling ice.
meanings.sent3: The iceman accidentally slipped on the ice he was delivering.
meanings.sent4: His heart was as frozen as the ice he carried, earning him the nickname 'iceman'.
meanings.sent5: The iceman's truck was filled with glistening blocks of ice, ready for delivery.

meanings.definition: A man who is skilled in the art of ice sculpting.
meanings.sent1: The talented iceman carved a beautiful swan out of ice.
meanings.sent2: Visitors marveled at the intricate ice sculptures created by the iceman.
meanings.sent3: The iceman's ice sculptures were so lifelike, they seemed to come alive.
meanings.sent4: His hands moved with precision, turning blocks of ice into masterpieces - truly an iceman.
meanings.sent5: Children gasped in awe at the magical creations of the iceman at the winter festival.

meanings.definition: A man who is emotionally cold or unfeeling.
meanings.sent1: Despite his charming smile, he was known as the iceman for his lack of empathy.
meanings.sent2: The iceman's stoic demeanor made it hard for others to connect with him.
meanings.sent3: Even in the face of tragedy, the iceman remained unmoved, earning him his icy reputation.
meanings.sent4: She felt a chill in his presence, as if she was standing next to an iceman.
meanings.sent5: His icy gaze seemed to freeze anyone who dared to approach him, solidifying his reputation as the iceman.
